snippet: Mitt Romney said last month that President Obama had not raised taxes during his tenure, but a new ad asserts the opposite, maintaining the health care overhaul amounts to a tax.
abstract: Mitt Romney said last month that President Obama had not raised taxes during his tenure, but a new ad asserts the opposite, maintaining the health care overhaul amounts to a tax.

headline.main: Romney Ad Has New Take on Whether Obama Raised Taxes
